localizations.title: Task Reminder
localizations.body:
游댒 Hello, {{UserName}}! 
You have a new task assigned: "{{Name}}".
Deadline: {{LocalEnd}}.
Please review it and complete it on time.

localizations.title: 햏햟쮏쨿쟳쫧썛쫧쟳  향햟햢햟혢햣
localizations.body:
游댒 햦쒫왐, {{UserName}}! 
햒 혝햣햠혪 햫햟향햫햟혢햣햫햟 햫쮏쒫썜 향햟햢햟혢햟: 춺{{Name}}췉.
햐쮏 쒬쮏햫햣햫햦혪: {{LocalEnd}}.
햏햣 향햟햠혞햢혧 쒬쮏햫햦혝혧 햣혬 쒫쮏쒬햣햪혪.
